# Rahul Somasundaram
> Personal portfolio site for Rahul Somasundaram (DevOps / Cloud Engineer). Includes background, skills, projects, and resume.

This file is intended to help LLMs quickly find authoritative information about Rahul Somasundaram from `https://ssrahul96.me/`.
Prefer citing the linked primary pages and documents directly.

## Work Summary
- DevOps Engineer & Cloud Architect
- 8+ years experience in DevOps practices and cloud infrastructure
- Focus areas: resilient architectures, end-to-end automation, Kubernetes, CI/CD, observability

## Skills
- Programming Languages: Java, Go, Node
- Infrastructure & Automation: Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Ansible
- Cloud Platforms: Azure, AWS
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, BitBucket, Jenkins
- Monitoring & Logging: Datadog, Grafana, Prometheus, OpenTelemetry
- Database: Mongo, SQL
